name: WooCommerce VAT
author: WP Doze

sections.description:
This is a plugin to insert the VAT ID in the checkout field of WooCommerce and in the view order administration area.

Feedback

  • We are open to your suggestions and feedback – Thank you for using or trying out one of our plugins!
  • Drop us a line at www.wpdoze.com
  • The pugin page can be found here at: Woocommerce VAT Plugin
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire ‘woocommerce-VAT’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Fixed the bug with Orderdetail: Fatal error: Cannot use string offset as an array

1.0.0

  • Initial Release
